title: Duel Masters (2017)
synopsis: In the new series' story, the balance of the Creature World is starting to crumble. A talking deck case named Decky comes to the human world to search for a Duel Master to preserve equilibrium. There he sees Joe's power to create creatures.
related_anime: ['Duel Masters', 'Duel Masters!', '40 Shuunen Da yo!! CoroCoro All-Star Shougakkou', 'Duel Masters VSRF']
